name: Hard Mobile Suit Gundam: The 08th MS Team Quiz / Test | Television | 10 Questions

questions.text: Who pilots a Ball mobile suit at the start of the series?
questions.explanation:
Shiro Amada.

	Shiro is a normal pilot, not a Newtype, which serves to emphasize the "common-soldier" aspect of the series. A Ball is a very small and weak mobile suit compared to Zaku's or even GM's.

questions.text: Where does the series take place?
questions.explanation:
Southeast Asia.

	While the original "Mobile Suit Gundam" series took place mainly in Europe and outer space, "The 08th MS Team" occurs in Southeast Asia. The other choices are all locations which feature prominently in the One Year War.

questions.text: Who asks Karen Joshua where her new commanding officer is?
questions.explanation:
Jidan Nickard.

	Karen is a young widow and serves as the team medic in emergency situations. She is also a long-serving mobile suit pilot and gets five confirmed kills during her tenure.

Side 2.

	Side 7 was where much of the original action of "Mobile Suit Gundam" takes place. Side 1 is where Judau Ashta is from. At the age of twenty-four, Shiro is one of the oldest Gundam main characters.

questions.text: Who's the pilot of the Zaku that Shiro fights?
questions.explanation:
Aina Saharin.

	Aina is a young pilot for the Zeon forces, and her older brother Ginias is one of their top scientists. Aina and Shiro fall in love, despite their being on two opposing sides of the One Year War.

questions.text: What's the one rule of the 08th MS team?
options: Everyone repairs their own mobile suit.
questions.explanation:
Everyone comes back alive.

	Shiro is originally full of ideals and more than a bit naive. Even before officially taking command of the 08th MS team, he risks his own life to save that of pilot Terry Sanders.

questions.text: Before the series, pilot Terry Sanders had a string of bad luck.
questions.explanation:
True.

	Sanders had been a member of several mobile suit teams before the events of the television series. All of his previous teams had died on their third mission, save for Terry, who was considered bad luck.

questions.text: What does Eledore want to become?
questions.explanation:
A music star.

	Eledore frequently listens to and writes music to pass the time. He pilots the support hovertruck, using sonar equipment to detect nearby enemy units.

questions.text: Michel has a girlfriend named Allie who still lives in the space colonies.
questions.explanation:
False.

	Michel's girlfriend is named B.B., not Allie. At the end of the series she marries someone else, leaving Michel despondent. In the twelfth episode Michel is a drunkard.

questions.text: Norris Packard is a pilot for the Zeon forces and mentor to Aina Saharin. What is his rank?
questions.explanation:
Colonel.

	Packard pilots a mobile suit known as a Gouf, which was also piloted in "Mobile Suit Gundam" by ace pilot Ramba Ral. He is killed in combat near the end of the series.
